greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{k>=1} A007953(k) / (k*(k+1)) where A007953(k) is the sum of digits of the integer k.
comment: Jeffrey Shallit generalizes this result to any base b (see Amer. Math. Month. link): Sum_{k>=1} digsum(k)_b / (k*(k+1)) = (b/(b-1)) * log(b) where digsum(k)_b is the sum of the digits of k when expressed in base b.
link: Jean-Paul Allouche, Somme de séries de nombres réels, Image des Mathématiques, CNRS, 2010 (in French).
J. O. Shallit, Solutions of Advanced Problems, 6450, The American Mathematical Monthly, Vol. 92, No. 7, Aug.-Sep., 1985, pp. 513-514; DOI: 10.2307/2322523.
results.author: _Bernard Schott_, Sep 08 2020
